questions.question: A set of paths are said to be linearly independent if

answers.b: No paths have a common node
answers.c: No two paths have a common node
answers.d: All the paths are pairwise distinct

questions.question: According to McCabe's Cyclomatic complexity, V(G) = E - N + 2. Here, N is

answers.a: No. of statements in the program
answers.c: No. of nodes in the CFG
answers.d: No. of edges in the CFG
